# AgentSecurity Documentation Index
# Machine-readable documentation index for AI agents
# URL: https://agentsecurity.dev/llms.txt

## Overview
> An open standard for defining security boundaries of autonomous AI agents.
> AGENTSECURITY.md is a declarative security policy file that lives in agent project roots.

## Pages
- [Home](https://agentsecurity.dev/) — Overview, quickstart, tier selection
- [What is AgentSecurity?](https://agentsecurity.dev/what-is-agentsecurity.html) — Problem, solution, progressive disclosure, limitations
- [Specification](https://agentsecurity.dev/specification.html) — Full format reference, field definitions, tier table, validation rules
- [Adopt](https://agentsecurity.dev/adopt.html) — Installation, CI/CD, framework integration, CLI reference, templates

## Key Concepts
- Security tiers: basic, standard, strict, regulated
- YAML frontmatter + Markdown body format
- Progressive disclosure: metadata at startup, full policy on activation
- Validator CLI: agentsec validate, agentsec check, agentsec report
- Compliance mapping: OWASP LLM Top 10, NIST AI RMF, ISO 42001, EU AI Act

## Resources
- [GitHub Repository](https://github.com/agentsecurity/agentsecurity)
- [JSON Schema](https://github.com/agentsecurity/agentsecurity/blob/main/spec/agentsecurity.schema.json)
- [Templates](https://github.com/agentsecurity/agentsecurity/tree/main/templates)
- [Examples](https://github.com/agentsecurity/agentsecurity/tree/main/examples)
- [PyPI Package](https://pypi.org/project/agentsec/)
